description: SCENE #1 - THE BEGINNING The lab monkeys have gone mad; catch the germ samples before they crash on the floor and escape!  Move the lab technician in position so the biohaz bag is in the right place; you can tap the desired location, or press in the edges (with up/down regions) of the screen. Each saved germ sample earns 1pt - a bonus exists when 300pt is reached - can you reach it? Samples dropped from the lower platform may not always release the germ inside the sample - resulting in a chance mode.
